entry.def: Disunity is lack of agreement among people which prevents them from working together effectively.

example.ex: He had been accused of promoting disunity within the armed forces.
example.tran: 人们指责他在军队内部搞分裂。

means.word_mean: 1. lack of unity (usually resulting from dissension)
